basics.name: Lapenta Giuseppe
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Curious, always looking for opportunities to learn new things in Computer Science and general knowledge.

work.company: Direction des Technologies et des services de l’Information de Nouvelle Caledonie
work.summary: Building a webapp replacing SYDONIA system for customs of New Caledonia. This app compute tax price on customs declaration. it work along Angular 2 with Redux and Spring Framework.

Conception and development of the web application of turnaround management for the Hub Control Center in Roissy-Charles de Gaulle – SWAN project - This web application work in real time with push notification powered by ActiveMQ.

My goal was to create a tool who generates test dedicated to Satellite code for Thales Alenia Space client. My Apprenticeship was divided into three stages: Firstly, I learned how the satellite works with the programming language Ada and how test are developed in a critical environment. Secondly, I programmed in Ada and made tests using the testing software IBM Test realTime with the team already working on the project. Finally, I developed a tool in Java who can generate test for satellite environment. On this project I drafted the specification and developed the tools using Scrum an agile software development methodology.

Created a website for user Management with a Java Framework used mainly by university and Bonita BPM Workflow software. The goal of this project is to facilitate the registration process and the vision of each user’s rights on services proposed by the university in a simple and scalable environment.
